dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 373 IH: Refusing to Assist Paying for United Nations Actions Against Israel Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gohmert introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To withhold United States assessed and voluntary contributions to the United Nations, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Refusing to Assist Paying for United Nations Actions Against Israel Act.

section.header: United States assessed and voluntary contributions to the United Nations
section.text: No funds are authorized to be appropriated or otherwise made available for assessed or voluntary contributions of the United States to the United Nations or to any organ, specialized agency, commission, treaty or treaty body, or other affiliated body of the United Nations and the United Nations System, until such time as United Nations Security Council Resolution 2334, regarding Israelâ€™s Settlements in the West Bank and East Jerusalem, is repealed in its entirety.
No funds are authorized to be appropriated or otherwise made available to pay interest on assessed or voluntary contributions that are withheld under this Act.
Effective on the date of the enactment of this Act, the Secretary of State shall notify the United Nations of the provisions of this Act.
